articles.title: European Space Agency Shares Pic Of ''Enigmatic'' Star System: ''Cosmic Dance Of Fire And Ice'' - NDTV
articles.description: The ESA dubbed it a ''cosmic dance of fire and ice'' with the star becoming increasingly hotter and dimmer.
articles.content:
The star system is located 3,400 light-years away.
The European Space Agency (ESA) on Friday shared a stunning picture of a mysterious star system. The star is located 3,400 light-years away in the … [+1790 chars]
